tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Fun.: "We Are Young"
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis:
"We Are Young" von Fun kannst du dir hier ansehen. Den Song kannst du dir hier bei iTunes downloaden: http://clk.tradedoubler.com/click?p=23761&a=2138906&url=http://itunes.apple.com/de/album/we-are-young-feat.-janelle/id463207143
http://www.ournameisfun.de http://www.warnermusic.de

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: It looks like﻿ it was fun to make :D
My algebra teacher used to play this song all the time during tests.﻿ That's how I found Fun.
i thought﻿ this was sung by a girl first time i herd it
I always like listening to this song. Man! Getting smashed in the head with a﻿ beer bottle and getting slamed with a chair.
I love this video and﻿ by the way im a girl
they over played this song so much on the radio.... good song﻿
I hear this n think of cruisin wit﻿ my brother singin r asses off I miss you lil bro! Forever young!
Wish I could like this song 100,000,000﻿ times over!! xx love you f.u.n.
It was.the.day.before I left for college. We held hands. We knew we only had one night. And﻿ this was on. We just held.eachother. because we were young. And.for one night his hands set me on fire.

@leonhardable Not at all actually ^^ It just gets pretty annoying when they start to play it like every other hour on the radio ;p Have you ever heard a song so﻿ often that someday you couldn't stand it anymore? Well I for sure have :/ It would be a pity if this happened wouldn't it? ^^
